lessons.japanese: 君がこの本を書いたって？
何年かしたら、その考えが間違っていたって思うかもよ。
lessons.indonesian: You might have to eat those words a few years from now.

lessons.japanese: 俺達に愛を説いたって無駄さ。余計憎しみを煽るだけなんだから。
lessons.indonesian: Don't fall in love because we hate you still.

lessons.japanese: たまに朝飯を抜いたって、別に悪いことじゃないよ。
lessons.indonesian: It's no crime to skip breakfast once in a while.

lessons.japanese: たとえ雨が降っていたって少しもかまわない。
lessons.indonesian: Even though it is raining, I don't care at all.

lessons.japanese: 祖父は８０を越えていますが、足はいたって達者です。
lessons.indonesian: My grandfather is over eighty years old, but he is a good walker.

lessons.japanese: 私がいたって彼がいうこと聞く訳ないじゃない。
lessons.indonesian: He never hears what I'm trying to say.

lessons.japanese: 君がこの本を書いたって？
君がこの本を書いたって？
lessons.indonesian: You're saying you wrote this book?

lessons.japanese: 何年かしたら、その考えが間違っていたって思うかもよ。
lessons.indonesian: You might have to eat those words a few years from now.
